::Spears::

She took a step towards Striker and her foot fell through the charred 
deck flooring.  She lifted her foot up and looked at Striker. 
"This place is falling apart.  We need to gut the ship and rebuild it 
from the inside out."
She looked around at the charred remains of the computer.
"Or we can try from the outside in, but I think we would have more 
success taking out all the damaged equipment and building from the 
inside. At least the preds won't be so likely to attack if they can't 
see us so readily."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker nods, looking around. "Ramulus has the complete programming 
of 
> everything on the ship backed up, I believe."
> 
> He walks over to a charred console, sighing. "The Cybertronian Fire 
has spare 
> comps, but this is Autobot technology, not Maximal. I doubt the two 
are 
> compatible."
